text: Ra hamile narkako dvarapalaharu pharistaharula'i bana'eka chaum ra hamile uniharuko sankhya kaphiraharuko pariksako nimti nirdharita gareka chaum, yasakarana ki kitabavalale visvasa garun ra mominaharuko imana aru dherai badhos ra kitaba manneharu ra mominale sanka nagarun ra juna manisaharuko hrdayama roga cha, uni ra kaphiraharule bhanun ki yasa drstantabata allahako ke uddesya cha? Yastai prakarale allahale jasala'i cahancha, margavicalita gardacha ra jasala'i cahancha margadarsana gardacha. Timro palanakartaka laskaraharula'i usa baheka kohi jandaina ra yo ta adamako santatiko lagi upadesa ra siksa samagri ho
